PS, it's also possible to do it only once at the top-level with 

```scala
initialize := {
  sys.props("foo.hello") = "bar"
  initialize.value
}
```

but it doesn't matter for this test.

The idiomatic way to do this however is to provide a `scalametaSemanticdb := fat/slim/none` settingKey. I imagine that the `none` will be very useful. I can do that change in sbt-scalahost in a followup PR if you like.
